## reduceRight() function

Same as [reduce()](./promizr.reduce.md)<!-- -->, only operates on `array` in reverse order.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function reduceRight<T, U>(array: T[], memo: U, iterator: AsyncReduceIterator<T, U>): Promise<U>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | T\[\] | The array to iterate on |
|  memo | U | The starting value for the reduce operation |
|  iterator | [AsyncReduceIterator](./promizr.asyncreduceiterator.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, U&gt; | The function that reduce each item and return the reduced result |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;U&gt;
